history: The enigmatic time traveler known as Chrono Guy has been appearing with increasing frequency. While he has explained publicly that he's from two thousand years in the future and here to 'maintain the timeline of order', it's unclear what his exact motives are, who he works for and what the implications are of his very existence.

A bioengineering experiment gone wrong, Compost Creature managed to escape its existence as a test subject under government control. While it appears quite terrifying and has a scent that can literally cause nerve damage, it seems to maintain a strong moral conviction for preserving the environment and improving soil health. Interestingly, it becomes incredibly hostile around plastics.

The humanitarian possibilities will change the world, they speculated... The engineers at Dynamo Labs perfected an autonomous A.I. filtration prototype, ready to be deployed anywhere in the world. The A.I. unexpectedly became corrupted by the collective negativity and became inundated by severe stress, bad luck, and a nasty disposition. Filtron has since gone rogue, attempting to purify his outer world, in hopes of finding a state of personal equilibrium.

Aurelia Kinsmen, aka The Empath lived a hard life of abuse growing up, yet always seemed to have room in her heart for others. She took their burdens and emotionally made them her own. While nobel, this also left her in a state of being continuously drained of energy. It hasn’t been until recently that she was able to remain fully present for any experience while maintaining her inner balance.

Chad Johnson was content as a middle aged man child, still reliving his college glory days. All that changed after he drunkenly tumbled down a quarry and became lodged under a pile of rocks. He emerged days later, with a new direction in life as a rock role model for all weak men out there looking to turn their lives around.

The Natural Ninja's history is unknown, but his first believed appearance was in a Tokyo street market performing an act of vigilante environmentalism. Dashing in and out of alley ways, confiscating all non biodegradable shopping bags, the Natural Ninja left only a note hanging from a shuriken stuck in the wall reading 'NO MORE'.

The Reuse-bot is the product of a genius kid inventory in New Delhi. He says the concept and blueprints continuously come to him in his dreams from a past life version of himself. The robot is completely autonomous and will actively scavenge and improve it’s form from junk in dumpster and litter on the streets. If it doesn’t need the trash,, a built-in recycling process converts it to something useful.

The Timber Terror awakened during after the California Fires of 2018. It's believed the energy of the forest manifested itself as the massive treant. Systematically, the wooded walker seems to be taking revenge for the destruction of its homeland by targeting oil and gas executives, factory farms, the military, and other heavy polluters.

The 4th dimensional Solar Sprite is a complete mystery to the scientific community and much of Earth. She is in the form of a human female sometimes and pure white light others. Her motives seem to be to provide desperate areas on earth with unlimited free solar energy, while actively delaying progress in fracking and coal explorations by temporarily blinding the workers.

Dirk Mullaney never fit in with society and often prefered the solitude of nature and felt a kinship with animals. During the crisis of 08, in frustration with the misguided priorities of society, Dirk became a hermit living completely in the woods. It is speculated that during this time he developed the remarkable ability to communicate with animals and some even believe he can mirror their spirit.
